zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator

类 Route2DDrawingIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • zhao.algorithmMagic.integrator.Route2DDrawingIntegrator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AlgorithmIntegrator<Route2DDrawingIntegrator>

    public final class Route2DDrawingIntegrator
extends Object
implements AlgorithmIntegrator<Route2DDrawingIntegrator>
    Java类于 2022/10/15 14:01:16 创建

    路线2维绘图集成器,您可以在这里实现有关路线绘图的操作

    请注意,该类的使用由内部自动去绑定对应的算法,您需要在该类示例化的时候去指定线路算法的名称! 一定要是拓展了" DoubleConsanguinityRoute"或其本身的算法名称!!!

    Route 2D drawing integrator, you can implement operations related to route drawing here, please note that the use of this class is automatically bound to the corresponding algorithm internally, you need to specify the name of the route algorithm when the class is instantiated !

    Please note that the use of this class is automatically bound to the corresponding algorithm internally, you need to specify the name of the route algorithm when the class is instantiated! Be sure to extend "DoubleConsanguinityRoute" or its own algorithm name!!!

    作者:
    zhao

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Route2DDrawingIntegrator(String integratorName, Route2DDrawingLauncher route2DDrawingLauncher) 
      Route2DDrawingIntegrator(String integratorName, String AlgorithmLauncherName)
      通过名称获取到启动器，这种方式适用于已经实现了启动器的算法，它会按照以下步骤执行 1.前往管理者，提取指定的算法 2.检查算法是否属于该集成器的启动器 3.检查启动器是否允许或支持绘制图像 4.将算法以启动器的身份加载到集成器

      设置离散阈值,该阈值越大,路线显示越清晰,该阈值可以扩大整个2维空间的显示,默认是 1 Set the discrete threshold, the larger the threshold, the clearer the route display, the threshold can extend the display of the entire 2-dimensional space, the default is 1

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Route2DDrawingIntegrator

        public Route2DDrawingIntegrator(String integratorName,
                                String AlgorithmLauncherName)
        通过名称获取到启动器，这种方式适用于已经实现了启动器的算法，它会按照以下步骤执行 1.前往管理者，提取指定的算法 2.检查算法是否属于该集成器的启动器 3.检查启动器是否允许或支持绘制图像 4.将算法以启动器的身份加载到集成器
        参数:
        integratorName - 集成器的名称
        AlgorithmLauncherName - 实现了启动器的算法名称

      • Route2DDrawingIntegrator

        public Route2DDrawingIntegrator(String integratorName,
                                Route2DDrawingLauncher route2DDrawingLauncher)

      • getDiscreteThreshold

        public int getDiscreteThreshold()

      • setDiscreteThreshold

        public Route2DDrawingIntegrator setDiscreteThreshold(int discreteThreshold)
        设置离散阈值,该阈值越大,路线显示越清晰,该阈值可以扩大整个2维空间的显示,默认是 1

        Set the discrete threshold, the larger the threshold, the clearer the route display, the threshold can extend the display of the entire 2-dimensional space, the default is 1

        参数:
        discreteThreshold - 新的离散阈值
        返回:
        链式

      • run

        public boolean run()
        运行绘图集成器
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 AlgorithmIntegrator<Route2DDrawingIntegrator>
        返回:
        运行如果没有发生错误 这里将会返回true

        If no error occurs when running, true will be returned here

      • runAndReturnValue

        public double runAndReturnValue()
        指定者:
        runAndReturnValue 在接口中 AlgorithmIntegrator<Route2DDrawingIntegrator>
        返回:
        运行该集成器, 并返回运行结果，该函数是带参数的运行，当运行成功之后会返回一个double类型的参数。参数大于0，代表运行成功！

        Run the integrator and return the result of the operation. The function is run with parameters. When the operation is successful, it will return a double type parameter. If the parameter is greater than 0, it means the operation is successful!

        endPointCoordinate - 终止坐标对象
